Interface Index

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>>>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultIndexImpl
public interface Index
extends java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>>>

An index for a text document. For each word that occurs in the document, the index holds a list of line numbers where the word occurs.

Author:
Laufer

Method Summary
 void add(java.lang.String word, int line)
          Adds an index entry for a word at the given line number.
 void clear()
          Removes all data from this index.
 boolean contains(java.lang.String word)
          Checks whether the index contains a particular word.
 int frequency(java.lang.String word)
          Returns the frequency of a word in a document.
 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> lines(java.lang.String word)
          Returns the list of line numbers (possibly containing duplicates) where a word occurs in a document.
 int size()
          Returns the number of words in this index.
